analysis: The project appears to be a website focused on black holes with a need for a dark, cosmic theme. The existing files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The theme should incorporate animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The CSS file needs to be completed with the full intended dark, cosmic theme, and the JavaScript file needs to be updated with proper event handlers and functionality for interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Update the JavaScript file to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including interactive elements related to black holes.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
